title: Lindsay Lohan has fun in hot pink suit as she blows kisses to the camera and dances at a gas station
text:
She's found success as an actress, a singer, a reality star AND a viral sensation.

Lindsay Lohan tried to launch a new viral dancing video on Wednesday night, posting an infectiously fun video to her Instagram in which she can be seen busting some moves outside of a slow-moving car at a gas station while wearing a gorgeous hot pink pantsuit.

The 33-year-old Georgia Rule star captioned the clip, 'Fillin’ the tank with my flamingo moves' along with a smattering of emojis and tagging two friends.

Pink lady: Lindsay Lohan tried to launch a new viral dancing video on Wednesday, posting a fun video in which she's busting moves outside of a slow-moving car in a pink pantsuit

Lohan also used the hashtag #dothelilo, calling to mind the 2018 Insta-vid of herself dancing in Mykonos, which launched said hashtag.

Later, Lilo was seen blowing a kiss to photographers in the same fabulously bright ensemble while arriving at her hotel in New York City.

The Mean Girls actress paired the statement suit with a black scoop-neck top, thick sunglasses and an expensive-looking quilted leather black handbag.

Her shoes were equally attention-getting — chic polka-dotted black stiletto pumps.

Later: Lilo was seen blowing a kiss to photographers in the same fabulously bright ensemble while arriving at her hotel in New York

Feelin it: The Georgia Rule star captioned the clip, 'Fillin’ the tank with my flamingo moves' along with a smattering of emojis and tagging two friends

Undeniable: Lindsay still has that popstar energy, as was evident in the social media share

Lindsay has been plotting her musical comeback, which comes over a decade after she last released new material.

So far, she released a track named Xanax, but so far there is no word on a possible date for her album's release.

The single Xanax debuted back in August on the Kris Fade Show podcast.

Lohan previously released two studio albums; Speak in 2004 and A Little More Personal (Raw) in 2005, which were certified platinum and gold respectively.

A statement suit: The Mean Girls actress paired her suit with a black scoop-neck top and thick sunglasses

Her singles Rumors, Over and Confessions of a Broken Heart (Daughter to Father) received commercial success, and her last single Bossy in 2008 reached number one on the Billboard Dance Club Hit chart.

The former child star has been busy with other pursuits though, earlier this year starring in the MTV reality show Lindsay Lohan Beach Club and more recently judging on Masked Singer Australia.

On the acting front, Lindsay has yet to find a new project on par with some of her well-received past work, like Freaky Friday, Mean Girls or (the underrated) Georgia Rule opposite Jane Fonda and Felicity Huffman.

Her last credit is this year's werewolf movie Among The Shadows.

More of Lindsay's moves: She couldn't help but enjoy herself
